segments.source_content: Welcome to the first day of **#30DaysOfSWA**!!

translations.zh-CN: 欢迎来到 **#30DaysOfSWA** 的第一天！

segments.source_content: Thank you for joining us on this fun and functional tour of **Azure Static Web Apps**. Whether you're new to the technology, or an experienced user, we hope there's something that interests and motivates you to keep going.

translations.zh-CN: 感谢您加入我们这次关于 **Azure Static Web Apps** 的有趣且实用的探索之旅。无论您是这项技术的新手，还是经验丰富的用户，我们都希望这里有一些内容能激发您的兴趣并激励您继续前进。

segments.source_content: ![](../static/img/series/banner-kickoff.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![](../static/img/series/banner-kickoff.png)

segments.source_content: ## Hello #30DaysOfSWA

translations.zh-CN: ## 你好，#30DaysOfSWA

segments.source_content: Simply put, it's a month-long series of blog posts that provides you a curated and structured tour through the universe of  [Azure Static Web Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/overview?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall).

translations.zh-CN: 简单来说，这是一个为期一个月的博客系列，为您提供一次精心策划且结构化的 [Azure Static Web Apps](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/static-web-apps/overview?WT.mc_id=30daysofswa-61155-cxall) 宇宙之旅。

segments.source_content:
* Each article will be 5 mins or less in reading time
 * Each ends with an activity to help reinforce the learning
 * Articles will follow a structured roadmap over 4 weeks

translations.zh-CN:
* 每篇文章的阅读时间不超过 5 分钟
 * 每篇文章结尾都有一个活动来帮助巩固所学知识
 * 文章将按照为期 4 周的结构化路线图展开

segments.source_content: We've organized the journey into four stages, each building on the previous one in a way that mimics the developer experience with any new technology:

translations.zh-CN: 我们将这段旅程分为四个阶段，每个阶段都建立在前一个阶段的基础上，模拟开发者使用任何新技术时的体验：

segments.source_content:
* **Week 1:** Focus on Core Concepts, learning terminology and getting setup.
 * **Week 2:** Focus on Usage Examples with quickstarts & front-end technologies.
 * **Week 3:** Focus on Dev Tools to develop, debug, test, and deploy, the SWA!
 * **Week 4:** Focus on Best Practices, from services to end-to-end experiences.

translations.zh-CN:
* **第 1 周：** 专注于核心概念，学习术语并进行设置。
 * **第 2 周：** 专注于使用示例，包括快速入门和前端技术。
 * **第 3 周：** 专注于开发工具，用于开发、调试、测试和部署 SWA！
 * **第 4 周：** 专注于最佳实践，从服务到端到端体验。

segments.source_content: ## Week 1 Roadmap

translations.zh-CN: ## 第 1 周路线图

segments.source_content: We are kicking off week 1 with a focus on **Core Concepts** to get you familiar with the high-level architecture, fundamental components and basic terminology for Azure Static Web Apps. Want a sneak peek at the topics? Here's a visual guide to help you!

translations.zh-CN: 我们以 **核心概念** 为主题开启第 1 周，帮助您熟悉 Azure Static Web Apps 的高层架构、基本组件和基础术语。想先睹为快吗？这里有一份视觉指南供您参考！

segments.source_content: ![Visual sketchnote of roadmap](../static/img/png/week1-roadmap.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![路线图视觉草图](../static/img/png/week1-roadmap.png)

segments.source_content: **By the end of week 1 you should know**:

translations.zh-CN: **到第 1 周结束时，您应该了解：**

segments.source_content:
* What Azure Static Web Apps is, and its benefits
 * How to get started building SWA or using it for your existing apps
 * How to go serverless, adding API capability with Azure Functions
 * How to configure SWA - from app behavior to build process
 * How to secure SWA - from user authentication to role-based authorization
 * How to preview SWA - on pull requests or test branches
 * How to deploy SWA - using different code sources, or CI/CD options

translations.zh-CN:
* Azure Static Web Apps 是什么，以及它的优势
 * 如何开始构建 SWA 或将其用于现有应用
 * 如何实现无服务器化，通过 Azure Functions 添加 API 功能
 * 如何配置 SWA——从应用行为到构建流程
 * 如何保护 SWA——从用户认证到基于角色的授权
 * 如何预览 SWA——在拉取请求或测试分支上
 * 如何部署 SWA——使用不同的代码源或 CI/CD 选项

segments.source_content: By the end of the week you should be familiar with SWA terminology and developer workflows - and be ready to explore usage scenarios with various front-end frameworks or static site generators!

translations.zh-CN: 到本周结束时，您应该熟悉 SWA 的术语和开发者工作流程，并准备好探索各种前端框架或静态站点生成器的使用场景！

segments.source_content: ## Take The Journey

translations.zh-CN: ## 踏上旅程

segments.source_content: They say it takes 30 days to make a habit. It's our hope that doing short bursts of reading and activity with Azure Static Web Apps on a daily basis, will lead to better learning and development habits in general.

translations.zh-CN: 有人说养成一个习惯需要 30 天。我们希望，每天花一点时间阅读和练习 Azure Static Web Apps，能帮助您形成更好的学习和开发习惯。

segments.source_content: We want to make it easy for you to participate - here are options to follow along:

translations.zh-CN: 我们想让您的参与变得简单——以下是您可以选择的跟进方式：

segments.source_content:
* Bookmark [this site](https://aka.ms/30DaysofSWA) and visit daily
 * Subscribe to the [RSS Feed](https://aka.ms/30DaysOfSWA/rss) in your favorite Feed Reader
 * Visit the [dev.to Series Page](https://dev.to/nitya/series/17901) and like, comment on, or bookmark, the posts.

translations.zh-CN:
* 收藏 [此网站](https://aka.ms/30DaysofSWA) 并每天访问
 * 在您喜欢的 Feed 阅读器中订阅 [RSS 源](https://aka.ms/30DaysOfSWA/rss)
 * 访问 [dev.to 系列页面](https://dev.to/nitya/series/17901)，点赞、评论或收藏文章

segments.source_content: Want to really get the most from this? Try the exercises each day, and take a moment on a weekly basis, to write a blog post or capture your own notes on what your main takeaways were. As a fan of [visual storytelling](https://twitter.com/sketchthedocs) I know that writing things down helps improve your understanding and recall of the material!

translations.zh-CN: 想要真正从中获益吗？每天尝试练习，并每周花点时间写一篇博客或记录您的主要收获。作为 [视觉叙事](https://twitter.com/sketchthedocs) 的爱好者，我知道写下内容有助于提高理解和记忆！

segments.source_content: ## Provide Us Feedback

translations.zh-CN: ## 提供反馈

segments.source_content: **We want to make this useful and beginner-friendly!** So if you have comments or questions that can help us improve this content, please drop us a note in our [Discussions](https://github.com/orgs/staticwebdev/discussions/categories/-30daysofswa) board!

translations.zh-CN: **我们希望这些内容对您有用且对新手友好！** 因此，如果您有任何意见或问题可以帮助我们改进内容，请在 [讨论区](https://github.com/orgs/staticwebdev/discussions/categories/-30daysofswa) 给我们留言！
